OOC: Nightlight and other two bots are near the base (She' and other 
are maximal, the other one aparentli is Maximal)

Nightlight::


Nightlight opened comm link with Kenzo "Kenzo, what happened??? it's 
was true that our leader is death? is that true? "



--- In nbwrpg@y...,1 "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk:  SIR YES SIR!
> 
> He goes to the exit and flies away.
> 
> OOC:  The scanners are still really short range right?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Hot Rod::
> > 
> > Hot Rod gets to the bridge, and takes the command chair. This 
> raises some eyebrows. 
> > 
> > Hot Rod presses a few button opening a comm channel to all 
Maximals.
> > 
> > "Maximals, please listen to this. The situation has changed for 
our 
> group. Talos has been confirmed dead, by Owlhawk. I have been told 
> that his last request was that I Hot Rod take command. I intend to 
do 
> so. Thank you for your time. Commander Rodimus Prime, out."
> > 
> > Rodimus hits another button closeing the commlinks except for 
> Owlhawks.
> > 
> > "Owlhawk, could you find out if any battles involving Maximals 
are 
> going on. If there our, i would like to go personally to help out, 
> and insure a Maximal victory."
